amendment.description: Amendment adds an expert on active duty military, armed forces personnel, and Veteran health and prescription opioid addiction to the Pain Management Best Practices Inter-Agency Task Force.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 114-551 to insert a representative on the task force for active duty military, armed forces personnel, and veteran health and prescription opioid addiction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nolan amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Nolan.
